tooltip.dnmmod.hag_eye: The Hag Coven often creates similar trinkets from those they once ate. A simple magical trinket that hides pleasant bonuses. They say it helps you see in the dark, and you can also use it to spot even those who are outside the walls!
tooltip.dnmmod.wand_core: In order for the wand to have magical properties, it needs to be powered. The core of the wand is made from various magical components that grant magical properties to the wand created by the caster.
spell.dnmmod.mage_armor.guide: You surround yourself with a web of magic, forming a shield. Your armor rating increases.
spell.dnmmod.night_vision.guide: You enhance your vision, allowing you to see in the dark.
spell.dnmmod.cloud_daggers.guide: You summon a cloud of spinning daggers that slice enemies apart.
spell.dnmmod.ice_dagger.guide: You create an ice dagger that explodes and deals damage to the target and everyone nearby.
spell.dnmmod.thunderwave.guide: You emit a wave of deafening thunder that repels the enemies around you.
spell.dnmmod.purity.guide: You remove all negative effects from yourself.
spell.dnmmod.caustic_brew.guide: You emit a stream of acid along the line of your gaze, dealing damage to all creatures in your path. The acid corrodes creatures, dealing damage to them for a short time.
spell.dnmmod.chromatic_orb.guide: You release a ball of concentrated magical energy that hits the enemy and the creatures closest to it.
spell.dnmmod.summon_undead_spirit.guide: You summon the spirit of a powerful undead that protects you from your enemies.
spell.dnmmod.summon_ravens.guide: You summon a flock of crows that protect you from your enemies.
